entries.journal_entry_description: Help Galody retrieve the circuit board from Tao-Ni Security's mainframe.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Destroy cyborgs to recover charged capacitors.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Good, now take the capacitors and overload the security mainframe.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Use charged capacitors to overload security mainframe. So you can safely remove the data.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Remove Circuit Board while security trap is disabled.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Now that you have recovered the circuit board, return to Galody.
